title: Takahiro Kawasaki
text:
is a Japanese <a href="baseball">baseball</a> player. He played formerly as a <a href="pitcher">pitcher</a> for the <a href="Chunichi%20Dragons">Chunichi Dragons</a> on a developmental contract in the <a href="Western%20League%20%28Japanese%20baseball%29">Western League</a>. He is currently without a team.
On 30 March 2016 he was loaned to the Fukushima Hopes in the <a href="Baseball%20Challenge%20League">Baseball Challenge League</a>.
On 1 October 2016, it was announced that he was deemed surplus to requirements at the Dragons, and therefore released.
